meanings.definition: Capable of producing a desired effect
meanings.sent1: The medicine was efficacious in treating his headache.
meanings.sent2: The new cleaning product proved to be efficacious in removing tough stains.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was so efficacious that it made the rabbit disappear instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as efficacious as a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers were so efficacious that he could defeat any villain with ease.
